text: The following is a list of bands that have played nu metal. Nu metal (also known as nü-metal and aggro-metal), is a form of alternative metal music that merges elements of heavy metal with elements of other music genres like hip hop, grunge, alternative rock and funk. ==0–9== *311 *12 Stones *36 Crazyfists *38th Parallel *3rd Strike *40 Below Summer *4Lyn ==A== *A.N.I.M.A.L. *Adema *Alien Ant Farm *Amen *American Head Charge *Apartment 26 *The Apex Theory
